DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Short-Course Preoperative Stereotactic Body Radiation Therapy Resectable Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , single center , prospective , single arm feasibility study use stereotactic body radiotherapy ( SBRT ) preoperative treatment surgically resectable pancreatic adenocarcinoma .
